typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string,
		{_col1_} as double,
		{_col2_} as date 'yyyy.MM.dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'sourcefolder',
	fileName: 'New Text Document.txt',
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> source1
Select1 derive(each(match(name=='date_'), $$ = toDate(toString($$),'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		column1 = iif(numberbig>0,'yes','no')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		name = {_col0_},
		numberbig = {_col1_},
		date_ = {_col2_}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
